books.author: by David Baldacci
books.description: In a sequel to “Memory Man,” Amos Decker, a detective with an extraordinary memory, investigates the case of a convicted killer who wins a last-minute reprieve.
books.name: THE LAST MILE

books.author: by Nora Roberts
books.description: A woman is haunted by her father’s crimes as she tries to pursue love and her work as a photographer.
books.name: THE OBSESSION

books.author: by Vi Keeland and Penelope Ward
books.description: An arrogant businessman's phone, lost on a commuter train, leads to an unexpected affair.
books.name: STUCK-UP SUIT

books.author: by Kristen Ashley
books.description: A grieving woman heads to Colorado, where a biker fatuously attempts to resist her.
books.name: BOUNTY

books.author: by Paula Hawkins
books.description: A psychological thriller set in the environs of London is full of complications and betrayals.
books.name: THE GIRL ON THE TRAIN

books.author: by Sylvia Day
books.description: The chronicle of a tempestuous marriage comes to a close.
books.name: ONE WITH YOU

books.author: by Cynthia D'Aprix Sweeney
books.description: Siblings in a dysfunctional New York family must grapple with a reduced inheritance.
books.name: THE NEST

books.author: by Jojo Moyes
books.description: A woman who has barely been beyond her English village finds herself while caring for a wealthy, embittered quadriplegic.
books.name: ME BEFORE YOU

books.author: by Curtis Sittenfeld
books.description: The author of “Prep” and “American Wife” retells “Pride and Prejudice,” set in the Cincinnati suburbs in the present.
books.name: ELIGIBLE

books.author: by Harlan Coben
books.description: A retired Army helicopter pilot faces combat-related nightmares and mysteries concerning the deaths of her husband and sister.
books.name: FOOL ME ONCE

books.author: by Nora Roberts
books.description: A woman finds romance in Ireland. First published in 1999.
books.name: JEWELS OF THE SUN

books.author: by Kylie Scott
books.description: A jilted bride is drawn, despite herself, to a rough-and-tumble bartender.
books.name: DIRTY

books.author: by Gilly Macmillan
books.description: An increasingly unstable investigator helps a desperate mother in the search for her missing son.
books.name: WHAT SHE KNEW

books.author: by Kristin Hannah
books.description: Two sisters are separated in World War II France: one in the countryside, the other in Paris.
books.name: THE NIGHTINGALE

books.author: by Amanda Quick
books.description: A matchmaker in Victorian England turns to a crime novelist for help when she starts receiving a series of disturbingly personalized trinkets.
books.name: 'TIL DEATH DO US PART
